/*
DROP SCHEMA report;

CREATE SCHEMA report;
*/

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS report.TripsByYYYYMM_databricks;
GO

CREATE VIEW report.TripsByYYYYMM_databricks
AS
SELECT 
    YYYYMM
    ,COUNT_BIG(*) AS Trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/delta/databricks/nyc-tlc/taxi_trip',
        FORMAT='DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    YYYYMM LIKE '2017-%' OR YYYYMM LIKE '2018-%' 
GROUP BY 
YYYYMM
GO
